Body: I moved from France to Italy, and it seems like my Play Store is stuck in France. The Operator is recognized correctly as Vodafone on the play store, but I still see the app recommendations in French and some Applications which should be available only in Italy are not downloadable (This item cannot be installed in your device's country)How do I get play store to recognize that I have moved to a different country. My phone is a factory unlocked Galaxy SIII GT-I9300 with stock OS, purchased in France.
Title: Play store stuck in old country

history.Text: I moved from France to Italy, and it seems like my Play Store is stuck in France. The Operator is recognized correctly as Vodafone on the play store, but I still see the app recommendations in French and some Applications which should be available only in Italy are not downloadable (This item cannot be installed in your device's country)How do I get play store to recognize that I have moved to a different country. My phone is a factory unlocked Galaxy SIII GT-I9300 with stock OS, purchased in France.
Play store stuck in old country
